attributes.action: stop the build of the 'battery style' cow milking farm in Lincolnshire. Cows should live outside not in sheds sleeping on sand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lincolnshire will build a factor farm housing over 8000 dairy cows which will be kept in industrial style sheads with little access to outside.

The cows will be milked around the clock to produce 430,000 pints each day. Dairy cows are usually milked up to twice a day, these factory cows will be milked at least 3 times a day.

The cows will survive on fodder and will stand and sleep on sand rather than outside.

If this build goes ahead we want the cows to be outside and not in sheads living and sleeping on sand.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
